headline: Micron Technology, Inc. (MU) is Attracting Investor Attention: Here is What You Should Know
summary: Micron (MU) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock's prospects.

headline: Micron Technology plans $2.2B Virginia plant expansion
summary: The latest expenditure is part of the chipmaker’s plans to invest $3 billion in the Manassas facility by 2030.
